page.title: 10NEW ENGLAND FARM
page.content: The farm is between 100 and 150 years old. Mr and Mrs Oldfield, the farmers, have been there for nine years.They get up at 6 o'clock in the summer and 8 o'clock in the winter.Next to them they have the original farm house which is very-overgrown.They have four barns and they use them all for storage.The machinery they have is a plough,three tractors,a roller,a hedgetrimmer,a corndrill,a combine-harvester,a crop sprayer,a forklift truck,three trailors,a fertitizer spreader and two cultivators.They have 220 acres of land,and they have three fields with wheat,oil-seed rape and winter beans in them.They leave part of their land for wildlife to live undisturbed.They have an orchard with apples, plums and damsons. They also have two white ducks and a tabby kitten.
